review_content:
I’m in LOVE with the shade ‘Retro’. It’s so beautiful, and when I saw my best friend wearing it, I ordered right away. This was the first Nudestix product I’ve purchased/tried so I’m new to the line. Pros: beautiful colour, easy to apply, comes with a sharpener Cons: felt sort of crumbly to wear, didn’t last as long as I expected. Overall I’d purchase again for the lovely shade, but me mindful that you’ll have to reapply more than other options.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Brighter than it looks on the pic, but SO GOOD
review_content:
first of all, the pictures shown are not great. I have kiss and belle and both of them are brighter/ lighter in person. Kiss may look pretty mauve and neutral but its a lot more of a bright pink in person. Belle irl looks a little darker than the pictures provided for kiss. Just keep in mind the colors will be lighter than what the pictures show. HOWEVER THEY ARE THE BEST I have used kiss on my cheeks for months just about every day and it lasts so so well. as its a pretty bright pink I just use it on my cheeks but it looks like a great natural flush. Just bought belle, and I am over the moon as to the color. I have fair-light skin and it is the perfect pinky nude for me! it is so flattering as a lipstick and a blush! I generally dont like matte lips so I wear with a gloss or a lip balm because my lips are so dry, but I am definitely going to get a lot of use out of belle. You only need a very little bit, and it lasts all day, so I think it is a phenomenal value. Especially in the summer, as a blush this lasts all day and looks totally natural. 10/10!!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I got this as a free sample with my order. I have seen similar sticks before, but have never used the ones that are for both cheeks and lips. I tried this color on the lips first and it was a beautiful blood red matte lipstick. It was creamy when applying, didn't tug at my lips, was opaque/matte in one swipe, and it was also not too light or not too dark. I definitely see it as a cooler undertone. Next, I tried it on my cheeks. I rubbed a nickel-sized amount on each cheek and blended with my finger in an upward motion towards my temples and was surprised at how intense the color was! I definitely put too much, I think you could get away with a dime-sized amount or smaller. But, I was pleasantly surprised by how beautifully this blended and didn't look harsh. It literally looks like a lit from within flush. I actually took a nap in this look just to see the staying power and I'm happy to report after a couple of hours of sleep there is no bleeding outside of my lip line, the color is still on, and my cheeks still have color. I definitely will buy a full-size version in Raven and check out other colors as well!

They're usually too pale, too pink, too orange, or too grey, but this colour is PERFECT; so flattering! I also love the formula. product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
This is my favorite nude lipstick over Mac and everyone else that I’ve tried. I have had a hard time finding a cool toned nude for me tamed is perfect. The formula just works and I like to do the whole lip/cheek thing but I don’t like pots. It’s such an easy to use reliable product and is travel/purse friendly. I also have a duo with whisper and another color(I used it up) they are great too. I think nudestix lipsticks are underrated. However the price is expensive. Not all lipsticks are the same size but for example too faced‘s nude lipsticks are .12oz nudestix are .10oz and you sharpen them. I have other lipsticks that are .10oz but they aren’t in packaging where they get sharpened. So it’s less than .10oz for $24 which is expensive in my opinion. The bottom line is I hate the price per ounce but I haven’t found a product that compares to these. I have a bite multistick but I still prefer these.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I did not like the formula of these nudestix lip pencils; they were extremely drying and sank into lines in my lips. It has a matte finish and is very pigmented. But the pencil is so creamy that when I remove the cap or place the cap back on, the tip kept becoming smushed or cracking and so I would have to resharpen the tip, wasting product. Comfortable wear is one of the most important factors to me in lip products and so I will be returning this product. I would not recommend. Instead, if you are looking for a satin finish, highly pigmented lipstick, try bite beauty's amuse bouche - those I would highly recommend

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Gray', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Love the colour. It's the perfect nude shade for me and it lasts so well, it even lasts through eating and drinking. I'd say the only downside is that it's fairly drying over time.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I love these pencils! I own three of them already and plan and grabbing more. They give a beautiful matte finish while feeling like nothing on the lips. Love finding a matte lip that doesn't make my lips feel like the Sahara (looking at you liquid lipsticks)!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Beautiful color and love the formula, it's very moisturizing and doesn't dry your lips or give you fine lines. Literally the only matte lipsticks I'll ever use.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: It's so soft but matt and stay for a long time. the main thing is its not dry like other matte lipstick.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: These are so underrated. I never hear many people talk about these and I have no clue why. I'm obsessed. So creamy and pigmented and perfect finish. Plus they all come in a cute container with a sharpener!! Can't beat the price either

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content:
Loovvve these! They go on creamy and dry down to a matte and they don't come off!! I eat and drink and they're still on. They're so comfortable as well, doesn't fee like your typical matte lip and pigment is to die for.The case it comes in is so cute as well and the mirror helps for touch ups on the go. All the colors are amazing, but Purity and Royal are my top. They're flattering colors on any complexion and can be also used as a blush. Def my go-to!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Hazel']
review_content: Entice is such a beautiful color--it's not nearly as orange as it looks in the photos. I'm pretty fair and this nude looks amazing. Like any matte lip color, it's not super comfortable on the lips, but it's not super noticeable throughout the day and lasts a long time. I'll definitely be buying other colors.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I love the colour, like a faint dusty rose. My only complaint is the same as all matte lip products. It's very matte and doesn't sit well on lips. I don't have chapped or dry lips but it still looked pretty awful on me. Going to try it a few more times with a light balm over, but might return it.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I anytime I wear mine in the shade Kiss I always get compliments. Such a flattering shade and very comfortable and easy to wear.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I got mine in a Glossybox mother's day box. I fell in love with it and have purchased another. The color stays all day even through coffee and feels like you have nothing on your lips. It doesn't dry my lips, but don't expect it to add any moisture either. I make sure to use balm at night and when necessary. And, it blends very easily as a cheek color.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: This color was perfect for me. The stick wasn't moisturizing by any means but didn't dry my lips out. I will definitely buy again.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: Belle was too drying and and streaky. I hated it. It says it's non drying matte lip but it was very drying on me. It would settle in my lines (even likes I didn't know I had) and made my lips look like an old lady's mouth, all wrinkly.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content:
Pros: Beautiful color selection Matte finish Semi long wear Contains a pencil sharpener Little goes a long way Cons: Not smudge-proof Feels sticky Drying Shows fine lines I received the color Belle as a sample in one of my play boxes, and I didn't touch it for months. Today, I decided that I wanted a pretty nude look, and I found this in my lipstick section. Belle is a very flattering color, but as a lipstick it was very sticky feeling. I was hoping that once it settled down that the sticky feeling would pass, but it took forever for the tacky feel to go away. It is somewhat long wearing. I ate lunch with it on, and I didn't touch it up, but blotting my lips (to remove the sticky feeling) would leave product on my blotting paper. I'm 22 with naturally big lips that are always hydrated, and this lipstick made my lip lines SUPER apparent. I'm disappointed because Belle is so universally beautiful.
…read more

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: Finally I've found a matte lip pencil that's hydrating and long lasting! This is honestly the only matte pencil I use that doesn't dry out my lips, is actually moisturizing, and is long wearing. The color Belle is beautiful, gives off a natural nude lip color, and it's absolutely beautiful.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_title: Definitely Intense Matte as a lipstick
review_content:
I got this in one of my Sephora Play boxes in the shade Belle and tried it as a lipstick first. At 42, with those pesky lip lines, it was just too matte and a bit drying. It seemed to emphasize every line in my lips. But, I also had a sample of the Smashbox Always On Matte in Driver's Seat. The shades are extremely close to each other. Somehow, when I topped it with the Smashbox, it looked good. Plus, once the Smashbox wore off some, the NUDESTIX looked like a lip stain. But, I wouldn't buy it as a lipstick. On the other hand, I kind of liked it as a blush when applied lightly. I think it's likely a good product for those who want a very matte look. Just not what I look for. Maybe in another shade I might find it more "multi-purpose"? But, I still wouldn't wear it on its own as lipstick. It does seem to do okay if I add another lipstick over it, but who wants to buy another lipstick to make another look like they want it too? To me, it's one of those "works great on some, but not others" items.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I have one of the cream nudestix and I wasn't a big fan because it comes off in an hour. These matte ones however are incredible!! The color Tamed is gorgeous and lasted me all day - even through eating!! The color didn't bleed or get grungy at all. I am so impressed!!!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Blue']

I don't know why I did that because holy moly I love this thing. I keep it in my purse for on-the-go application. It is my perfect MLBB product and it is SO easy to apply. product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I'm a big fan of matte liquid lipsticks but I hate that I have to reapply very often and how dry they make my lips feel. This is awesome because it not only dries matte (my dream!!!) but it also feels moisturizing to your lips so you don't go crazy the whole day. It's so easy to reapply if you need. My dream matte lipstick for suuuure.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: Love how smooth it glides onto my lips and I don't find it drying. It's also light on the lips so it great for everyday use. I just don't like how much gets wasted when sharpening it and it isn't very pigmented

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Hazel']
review_title: Great for a subtle or dramatic, buildable look
review_content: I like matching lip and cheeks, adds a nice harmony to your makeup! This is a beautiful product that works for both. Really nicely blendable on the cheeks. Only thing is, on the lips it's a little drying. I have it in Belle and it's very very nice.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: I'm obsessed with these! I have a few now and they're some of my favorites. They're absolutely beautiful and apply so easily. However, they're not smudgeproof, but I love the formula and slim packaging so much that I'm okay with the transfer. Reapplication is a breeze too! I want one in every color!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_content: I received this in my Play box, and the color range and texture just aren't for me. The shade I received made my lips look a bit brown, which isn't flattering, and this formula highlighted every line. In the words of Cher, it's a "full-on Monet": up close, it's a big ol' mess!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: Really nice finish (matte) but keeps my lips hydrated and not cakey or dry looking... I want more colours. New favourite lipstick line

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_title: love love love! ordering more asap!
review_content:
I ordered Raven- deep red, not paying attention to the fact that it says (Deep red) HOWEVER, I LOVE the color! It only sneered a tiny bit onto my wine glass, but not onto my teeth; which some lip shades do. I where it to work, out on dates and I always get compliments! I have small lips, and my lips looks bigger (which is nice to me) also, my lips aren't dried out by the end of the night. And the big bonus is that it lasts for the whole night! I don't need to reapply or feel the need to keep going to the bathroom to keep checking to see if it's all over my face or on my teeth. Well worth the money! The packaging is awesome too because you don't need to purchase a sharpener, and the box that it comes in is big enough to put your travel cosmetics in, and small enough to fit in your purse. And it has a mirror inside too. Everyone must get onboard!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I got this in the shade Kiss and it's sort of a darkened but soft coral. I greatly prefer this to liquid lipsticks because it's easier to apply and blot and I don't feel self-conscious about transferring or bleeding. There is a tiny but of transfer but I'm ok with that because it doesn't ever make my lips feel uncomfortable! Highly recommend.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content: The formula is great. The colour is average.

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: I love how it is multi-functional and it does what it says, long wearing, transfer proof and etc. I need to purchase other shades and try other products from Nudestix. Ninzy Approved

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Hazel']
review_content:
I bought a 3 pack of these today. I came home and tried out the colors and while all were well pigmented and lovely shades, the color Raven was the most glorious shade of red I've found in years. I am brunette with fair skin. I'm in my mid 50's, which means I have to be a little more careful with colors nowadays, one shade off and I look sallow. The wrong shade of red ages you but this red is PERFECT! It's just the right amount of depth, not too orangey, looks grown up without being overdone. For a lip crayon, it goes on really smoothly and stays put without being overly dry. Seattle is cold and dry right now, so that's saying something. I haven't been this impressed with a product in years!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
review_content: Definitely my new 'won't leave home without it' product! Lips go on smoothly and aren't drying, color is rich and beautiful and is just as amazong on the cheeks!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil

I tell all of my friends to get it!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil

review_title: good for lips, not so much cheeks

It doesn't dry your lips out and it stays on very well!!

product_name: NUDESTIX Intense Matte Lip + Cheek Pencil
